## Load libraries

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load data as variables

```{r}
#| message: false
augment_data <- read_tsv("/net/pupil1/home/people/s253689/projects/group_12_project/data/03_dat_aug.tsv")
```

## Graphical Comparisons

### Outcome compared to age

```{r}
ggplot(augment_data, aes(x = response, y = age, fill = response)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.15, alpha = 0.6, size = 2) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("RD" = "blue", "pCR" = "magenta")) +
  labs(
    x = "Response",
    y = "Age",
    title = "Distribution of age with outcome"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14)
```
